resources.string:
Patch Notes

Version 9 / v1.4.0 / January 8, 2021

• Add "Show Password" switch to login and sign up screens
• Add ability to duplicate lists
• Add "Reset Tutorial" and "Patch Notes" to settings
• Modify settings UI
• Merge "First Vote" and "Last Vote" to "Vote Points" in settings


Version 8 / v1.3.2 / January 3, 2021

• Modify results sorting priority:
&tab;1. Most vote points
&tab;2. Most number of users voted
&tab;3. Most vote points by users, bonus points excluded
• Change the graphics of list and vote activities


Version 7 / v1.3.1 / August 19, 2020

• Allow online voting using the same account
• Allow online voting without registration
• Add landscape layouts to online voting
• Add full tutorial


Version 6 / v1.3.0 / July 30, 2020

• Add beta version of online voting
• Customize Toast popups


Version 5 / v1.2.0 / May 15, 2020

• Add option to show how many points every voter gave to an activity
• Save 7 latest results to cloud and add ability to see those results
• Add splash screen
• Optimize activity deletion when removing lists


Version 4 / v1.1.0 / April 28, 2020

• Add basic tutorial when user logs in for the first time
• Add option to show total, bonus and peril points when voting
• Adjustments to the landscape layouts
• Prevent giving negative numbers to List Items
• Lock device orientation during voting


Version 3 / v1.0.2 / April 20, 2020

• Fix app crashing when relaunching app
• Modify Settings and Lists landscape to better fit on screen


Version 2 / v1.0.1 / April 20, 2020

• Fix app crashing with devices which are lower than API level 24


Version 1 / v1.0.0 / April 18, 2020

• All the basic functionality of the app is now working
• User interface has been changed drastically
• App can be used in landscape
• User can adjust point thresholds and other options from settings page
